item.title: PlayStation MENA Hero Project titles announced – Red Bandits, Enci’s Solution, The Perfect Run, and A Cat’s Manor
item.content:encoded:
Sony Interactive Entertainment has announced the first four titles as part of its MENA Hero Project, an initiative that aims to “identify and support original voices and empower creators from [the Middle East and North Africa] to tell their stories through games.”

Get the details on each game below.

Red Bandits

  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, PC
  • Developer: Team Agenda
  • Country: Saudi Arabia

Red Bandits is a fast-paced robbery action game set in a hyper-capitalist age where one company rules the world through complete monopoly. In this world, a newly formed thieves organization known as the Red Bandits, emerges to challenge the system and spark a rebellion. You play as Stutt, a seasoned old thief with a stuttering condition and a mysterious past he can’t fully remember.

Break into the company’s fortified floors, take down the powerful board of directors, and bring back a de-monopolized world order. With a dynamic cover system, evolving heists, and a vibrant comrades’ hideout, Red Bandits blends fast, stylish action with a deeply personal story of rebellion.

Enci’s Solution

  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, PC (Steam)
  • Developer: Dark Emerald Studios
  • Country: United Arab Emirates

Exiled by humans centuries ago, the Aeons are confined to the desolate underground. Their village is safe, but beyond the gates, danger lurks at every corner, and not everyone can be trusted. No one has left the village before, except for Ji’we.

Inspired by techno-dystopian aesthetics, Enci’s Solution is a hand-painted, 2.5D narrative platformer following the story of Ji’we, a young Aeon venturing out into the unknown in an attempt to save his dearest friend. Stumbling upon Enci, a lost encyclopedic robot who finds himself far from home, the two form an unusual bond and set out together to the surface of planet Regalia.

Play through over 40 levels with increasing difficulty and explore uncharted territories. Find collectibles and uncover the secrets they carry about the world and its odd inhabitants. Keep an eye out for hidden levels and challenge yourself to think outside the box.

The Perfect Run

  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, PC
  • Developer: Lanterns Studios
  • Country: Tunisia

Save the world or blow it up yourself, one loop at a time! The Perfect Run is an action adventure RPG game where the player controls Quicksave, a time-traveling hero caught in an epic struggle between supervillain gangs, marketed superheroes, and a powerful mega corporation for the control of the city of New Rome.

With three days to decide the city’s fate, the player can go back in time to decide their perfect ending… if they have the skill to do so! Interact with NPCs and unlock new dialogue options thanks to information collected in earlier loops, join a faction in one route and fight them the next, bend time itself in epic battle against superpowered bosses, collect the best upgrades before the reset, and unlock the city’s secrets in this memorable superhero adventure.

A Cat’s Manor

  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, PC (Steam)
  • Developer: Happiest Dark Corner
  • Country: Bahrain

You awaken trapped in a house infested with spiders and inhabited by an eccentric family. At the end of your tail, you discover a crudely stitched hand. With no memory of who you are or how you got here, you let curiosity guide you forward.

A Cat’s Manor is an atmospheric adventure that blends puzzles, combat, crafting, and rhythm-based music challenges. Use your wits to escape the manor. Investigate your surroundings, solve puzzles, fight your way through deadly encounters, or outsmart your foes and avoid trouble.

Inspect, observe, listen, and feel your surroundings for clues and cues, immersing yourself with 3D audio and PS5 DualSense controller features. Uncover the secrets of the manor and unravel what the family is hiding.

item.title: Million Depth launches November 12
item.content:encoded:
Side-scrolling deep-diving action strategy game Million Depth will launch for PC via Steam on November 12, publisher PLAYISM and developer Cyber Space Biotope announced. It will support English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options.

A demo is planned for release in September, which will feature one out of the three routes in the full game in its entirety.

■ Newest Trailer

The newest trailer features the game’s theme song “Re,Future” for the first time. In the trailer, you’ll be introduced to the underground world of Million Depth, Moma across several timelines and her journey to find her only friend, the unique time-freezing, strategic combat system, the crafting screen where you can create any weapon you can imagine, and bartering shops where you can exchange for all sorts of items.

The trailer also features scenes from timelines that don’t exist in the actual game, representing the title’s theme of parallel worlds. Hints from the trailer can be analyzed alongside the full game experience for an even deeper understanding of the world of Million Depth.

■ Upcoming Demo

Furthermore, we will be releasing a demo on Steam in September, which features the entirety of Route α, the first route of the game. In Route α, you can get a feel for the basic game systems, as well as the beginning of a story filled with twists and turns, and finally, multiple endings depending on your actions.

Demo save data can be carried over to the full game, so please wishlist the game on Steam and look forward to the demo!

■ Theme Song “Re,Future” to be Performed Live by Singer Songwriter VTuber Ririsya on Stream!

The theme song of Million Depth, “Re,Future,” is performed by Ririsya, a singer songwriter VTuber. For her fifth anniversary, she will have a live stream concert on YouTube today!

Ririsya’s fifth anniversary concert will be split into two parts, and Re,Future will be performed live during the second half that begins at 9:00 PM (JST). She will also be watching the new trailer on stream and will share her thoughts of playing an in-development demo of the game! Of course, the concert will also feature some of Ririsya’s original songs, and viewers can interact with her through the live chat.

The concert will be archived, so even if you can’t make it live, you can always watch it later!

  • Stream: Ririsya’s Fifth Anniversary Live (Part 2)
  • Time and Date: August 23, 2025, 9:00 PM (JST) onward
  • Platform: YouTube

About Ririsya

A singer songwriter VTuber. Mainly does music streams on YouTube, and writes her own original songs as well as music for other artists and video games. Has a dedicated fanbase both in Japan and globally and attends events all around the world. Her fans are nicknamed “SnekFans”.

Works include:

  • Ano Hi no Bokura E / hololive Blue Journey
  • Koibumi Zensen / hololive Yamato Phantasia
  • From Fate / Akari Kito
  • Unlock Story / Naomi Payton
  • Aqua,Luna-rium / SOUND VOLTEX
  • Letters from Heaven / DEEMOⅡ
  • Yuigon / HIMEHINA

Appearances include:

  • MUSIC VERSE#011
  • VTuber Style
  • NHK Radio “VR!”
  • CAPCOM “Exoprimal“
  • OffKai EXPO
  • Kurocon
  • Ikebukuro HUMAX Cinemax
  • etc.

■ About the Game

A Deep Descent in Search of You

Moma sets off on a journey in search of her friend, who she believes is in the million-floors-deep underground world of Million Depth. However, what awaits is a constantly changing world. The true story behind Million Depth differs between timelines, and Moma’s fate too changes with the world around her.

Moma’s past decisions have consequences that ripple into the future and even other timelines in unimaginable ways. She will have to piece together fragmented clues from her journey to solve the many mysteries she comes across.

Freeze Time to Strategize

Moma has a “biotope jammer,” an incredible device that stops time around her as long as she also stays motionless. It’s her key to survival in Million Depth, where all sorts of dangerous creatures lurk in the shadows. Even if she finds herself surrounded by enemies, she can stop them in their tracks to figure out a way to break through.

However, Moma’s weapons and shields only have limited durability. During battle, they deteriorate and eventually break. Until they’re repaired, Moma becomes completely defenseless, but this is when the biotope jammer comes in clutch. Freeze time, carefully plan your next move, and ensure Moma’s survival.

Get Creative with Weapon Crafting

Moma can equip two pieces of equipment, both hand-crafted by combining different types of blocks.

Some blocks can be upgraded by being placed with others of the same type. Use them wisely to craft any weapon, from long-range guns to sturdy shields.

Ultimately, your creativity is what will give you the upper hand.

Barter with Shopkeepers

Throughout Moma’s journey, she will encounter several shopkeepers offering crafting blocks, items, and relics that can enhance her abilities.

However, shops in Million Depth don’t take traditional payment. Barter with the shopkeepers while keeping a keen eye on the value of your offer and the shopkeepers’ mood to get the best deal possible. If it goes well, they might offer you valuable items at bargain prices, but if you get too greedy, you risk upsetting the shopkeeper, who might hike the prices in response.

What’s more, the underground world is also home to a strange resource called stockinum, the value of which fluctuates constantly…
